english.segment1: Sit down in the carousel. Up front like a brave boy. Don't scream like a little girl. Shut up boys don't cry
english.segment2: Come to a rest that flows. From a spring unseen. Cause honestly you're scaring me
english.segment3: Keep up with the schedule. Shape up, have to perform. Hold out for everyone. Don't fail not now
english.segment4: Come to a rest that flows. From a spring unseen. Cause honestly you're scaring me
english.segment5: Failure is not an option. Have to keep on trying
english.segment6: So much to live up to. So many expectations. Trying so hard to be approved. A straight A student with yet another F. Oh no gotta make daddy proud now
english.segment7: Come to a rest that flows. From a spring unseen. Cause honestly you're scaring me
english.segment8: Failure is not an option. Have to keep on trying. So much pressure. Can't take this no more. The cause of death. Suicide
